title: Michael Emerson in "The Practice" (2) (www.michaelemerson.it)
author: Chiara Spini
comment: Emerson is splendid in this role. Currently, he is creating havoc as Leland Townsend on the series Evil. He has proven to be a consummate character actor.

Flipping channels tonite and came upon 'Person of Interest'.  Whenever I see Emerson, this character in this show always comes to mind. He was scary good. Then I found out who his wife is.  Both are excellent!
description: "The Practice", Episodio 05x08: "Mr. Hinks Goes to Town".
